summary: Completed comprehensive UI testing of ForaTask multi-tenant SaaS application after UI overhaul. All new pages (Employees, EmployeeProfile, Reports, Settings) load correctly. All navigation items work. Responsive design at 390px width has hamburger menu and properly stacked components.

issues: Console warning about chart width/height being -1, but charts render correctly after data loads

login_flow: Login with admin credentials (rajvi@varientworld.com / Rajvi@123) works
Redirects to dashboard after successful login
dashboard: Stats cards display (Task Progress %, Total Task, Over Due)
Today's Task table with Self/Team toggle
Calendar widget with current date highlighted
employees_page: Page loads with employee count header
Blue (#1360C6) header table with columns: Name, Designation, Email Id, Contact No, Type
Shows all 3 seeded employees (Rajvi Admin, Shubh Supervisor, Tushar Developer)
Click employee name navigates to profile
employee_profile_page: Overview shows stats (Present Days, Absent Days, Half Days, Attendance %)
Working Days vs Present Days progress bar
Attendance tab shows daily log table with blue header
Salary tab shows salary info or placeholder
task_list_page: Status filters (All, Pending, In Progress, Completed, Overdue) present
Blue header table with columns: Task Name, Doer, Priority, Deadline, Status
Click task name navigates to detail
task_create_page: Form fields: Title, Description, Priority, Type, Due Date
task_detail_page: Details tab shows title, description, priority, due date
Discussion tab with comment input and send button
reports_page: Stats cards (Total Tasks, Completed, In Progress, Overdue)
settings_page: Organization Settings (admin only) with working hours
chat_discussion_page: New chat button opens user list for DM
mobile_responsive_390px: Sidebar slides in when hamburger clicked

critical_code_review_comments: React Router v6 future flag warnings present - consider updating for v7 compatibility
Chart width/height console warnings - low priority, charts render correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI overhaul complete and tested. All new pages work: Employees, EmployeeProfile, Reports, Settings. Navigation items updated: Dashboard, Task, Discussion, Reports, Employees, Settings. Blue (#1360C6) table headers implemented across all tables. Multi-location task create control (0-7 locations) working. Mobile responsive at 390px with hamburger menu. All 3 user roles can login.
